section.title: Overview
section.para: This module is an implementation of a cache system designed for DNS records. For successful DNS queries of all types, the module will store in a cache/db backend the mappings, for TTL number of seconds received in the DNS answer. Failed DNS queries will also be stored in the back-end, with a TTL that can be specified by the user. The module uses the Key-Value interface exported from the core.

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para: A cachedb_* type module must be loaded before loading the dns_cache module.

section.title: cachedb_url (string)
section.para: The url of the key-value back-end that will be used for storing the DNS records.

example.title: Set cachedb_url parameter
example.programlisting: ... #use internal cachedb_local module modparam("dns_cache", "cachedb_url","local://") #use cachedb_memcached module with memcached server at 192.168.2.130 modparam("dns_cache", "cachedb_url","memcached://192.168.2.130:8888/") ...

section.title: blacklist_timeout (int)
section.para: The number of seconds that a failed DNS query will be kept in cache. Default is 3600.

section.title: Exported Functions
section.para: The module does not export functions to be used in configuration script.
